meanings.definition: A person who takes part in an activity with another or others.
meanings.sent1: My friend is my partner in playing soccer.
meanings.sent2: I have a dance partner for the talent show.
meanings.sent3: My partner and I always have fun playing board games together.
meanings.sent4: In cooking class, the flour and sugar are partners in making a cake.
meanings.sent5: Being a good partner means working together and helping each other.

meanings.definition: A person who shares in a business.
meanings.sent1: My dad's partner helps him run the family store.
meanings.sent2: The two friends became partners in their new restaurant venture.
meanings.sent3: The partners in the company always have meetings to discuss new ideas.
meanings.sent4: Hard work and dedication are partners in building a successful business.
meanings.sent5: Choosing the right partner can make all the difference in a business.
